languages.text: "Фенрис никогда не пришлось бы отбивать у слуг Архиврага! Волчий род непокорим! А ты, {name}, выбирай слова осторожно, иначе прогневишь меня!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"
languages.original_text: "Фенрис никогда не пришлось бы отбивать у слуг Архиврага! Волчий род непокорим! А ты, {name}, выбирай слова осторожно, иначе прогневишь меня!"

traits.locale_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you see my anger!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you see my anger!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you see my anger!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you see my anger!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"
"Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

languages.text: “芬里斯永远不用担心混沌大敌的仆人！野狼的血脉不屈不挠！至于你，{name}，你说话最好当心点，以免招致我的愤怒！”
languages.original_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

traits.locale_text: “芬里斯永远不用担心混沌大敌的仆人！野狼的血脉不屈不挠！至于你，{name}，你说话最好当心点，以免招致我的愤怒！”

languages.text: « Fenris n'aura jamais besoin d'être libérée des serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! Le sang des Loups est indomptable ! Quant à vous, {name}... Je vous suggère de faire attention à ce que vous dites, si vous ne voulez pas susciter ma colère ! »
languages.original_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

traits.locale_text: « Fenris n'aura jamais besoin d'être libérée des serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! Le sang des Loups est indomptable ! Quant à vous, {name}... Je vous suggère de faire un peu plus attention à ce que vous dites, si vous ne voulez pas me voir en colère ! »

languages.text: 「フェンリスを渾沌の勢力から解放しなければならない状況は一生訪れない！狼の血は不屈だ！{name}、俺を不意に怒らせたくないなら慎重に言葉を選べ！」
languages.original_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスを渾沌の勢力から解放しなければならない状況は一生訪れない！狼の血は不屈だ！{name}、俺を怒らせたくないなら慎重に言葉を選べ！」

languages.text: «¡Fenris no tendría que ser liberada de los siervos del Archienemigo! ¡La sangre de los Lobos es indomable! ¡Y usted, {name}, será mejor que tenga cuidado con lo que dice si no quiere provocar mi ira!».
languages.original_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Fenris no tendría que ser liberada de los siervos del Archienemigo! ¡La sangre de los Lobos es indomable! ¡Y usted, {name}, será mejor que tenga cuidado con lo que dice si no quiere sufrir mi ira!».

languages.text: "Fenris müsste nie von den Dienern des Erzfeinds befreit werden! Wolfsblut ist unbezwingbar! Und Ihr, {name}, solltet Eure Worte mit Bedacht wählen, damit Ihr nicht meine Wut provoziert!"
languages.original_text: "Fenris would never need to be liberated from the Archenemy's servants! Wolf blood is indomitable! And you, {name}, should choose your words carefully lest you provoke my anger!"

traits.locale_text: "Fenris müsste nie von den Dienern des Erzfeinds befreit werden! Wolfsblut ist unbezwingbar! Und Ihr, {name}, solltet Eure Worte mit Bedacht wählen, damit Ihr nicht meine Wut erleben müsst!"
